rooms.name: Living Room / Kitchen Combo
rooms.description: Open-plan living area with integrated kitchen, featuring Mediterranean design elements such as warm color palette, natural stone flooring, and built-in wooden cabinetry.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with south-facing windows for optimal sunlight, adhering to Vastu principles for relaxation and comfort.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom designed with sufficient natural light and ventilation; includes a small balcony overlooking the garden area.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3 (Guest Room)
rooms.description: Guest room placed near the living area for convenience with an emphasis on clean lines and simplicity.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: General bathroom adjacent to master bedroom, incorporating water features in line with Vastu guidelines to ensure balanced energy flow.

rooms.name: Utility Room / Storage
rooms.description: Small utility space for storage and laundry facilities, designed with modular shelving systems.

openings.description: Wide entrance with a Mediterranean arch design, leading directly into the open-plan living area. The door is double-layered for improved insulation and privacy.
Secondary access to the garden area, incorporating sliding glass doors for an unobstructed view of the greenery.
Large windows on the southern wall to ensure ample natural light and maintain energy flow as per Vastu principles.
Strategically placed windows in each bedroom for ventilation and natural lighting, ensuring alignment with cardinal directions advised by Vastu.
